TopicTitle: Technologies that need one(or more) specific experiments to be done to be aviable

Articles.Content: Another suggestion i came up with, it would be interesting if there would be added some technologies that require some kind of experiment need to be done first, not only science points. Like you need first do a pressure scan (or earn some points or score using it) tobe able to research advaced parachutes, or that you need fist to take a surface sample to be able to research heavy legs

In my opinion science points should be dropped completely and the whole tech tree should be driven this way. But that's just my perspective looking at the game in its current state. W don't know what's the devs' exact plan for the final Career mode and it will most likely be more complex than it is now.
